Projekt
  • {{ section.summary }}
import { Component, Inject } from '@angular/core'; import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; @Component({ selector: 'app-nav-menu', templateUrl: './nav-menu.component.html', styleUrls: ['./nav-menu.component.css'] }) export class NavMenuComponent { isExpanded = false; lang = "en"; collapse() { this.isExpanded = false; } toggle() { this.isExpanded = !this.isExpanded; } public sections: Sections[] = []; constructor(http: HttpClient, @Inject('BASE_URL') baseUrl: string) { http.get(baseUrl + 'Sections?lang=' + this.lang).subscribe(result => { this.sections = result; }, error => console.error(error)); } changeLang(lang2) { console.log(lang2); } } interface Sections { id: number; summary: string; type: string; }
